import { useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { addStreamer, removeStreamer } from '../redux/uploadSlice' const StreamersListEntry = ({streamer}) => { return (
{streamer.viewers}

{streamer.name}

Ads Queued: {streamer.stack.length}

Stream Title: {streamer.streamTitle}

Followers: {streamer.followers}

) } export default StreamersListEntry
